info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 11:41PM MDT until July 09 at 12:45AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: The National Weather Service in Glasgow has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Daniels County in northeastern Montana... Roosevelt County in northeastern Montana... Northeastern Valley County in northeastern Montana... Sheridan County in northeastern Montana... Northern McCone County in northeastern Montana... Northwestern Dawson County in northeastern Montana... Richland County in northeastern Montana... * Until 1245 AM MDT. * At 1140 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles north of Peerless to 12 miles west of Vida, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Sidney, Wolf Point, Plentywood, Scobey, Poplar, Culbertson, Richland, Fairview, Brockton, Medicine Lake, Bainville, Froid, Richey, Westby, Flaxville, Peerless, Lustre, Lambert, Port Of Scobey and Redstone. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
